/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. In the distance, mountains rise, adding a touch of nature's grandeur to the urban setting. The street itself is lined with trees, their green leaves contrasting with the concrete structures. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their daily routines. Cars are parked along the street, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. The image is a snapshot of life in Beijing, blending urban development with natural beauty.
